page.title: 06Pollution from animal farm
page.content: ohn Pointon's animal by products farm s the only factory in the area around Wetley Rocks & Cheddleton.The factory is near to houses and the residents compain that the site is too near and that the smell,generated from the factory is appalling. "The factory is a pain in the neck" say the residents. They claim that the smell is so bad that they cannot have their windows open. The smell is caused by the burning of waste that is left over from the animals. The residents would like to see the factory moved or closed down but unless the factory is moved right out into the country there doesnot seem to be another place for it, and so it looks as if the residents of Cheddleton will have to put up with it, for the time being, anyway.
